de.mrapp.android.preference.activity

Interface WizardListener


  • public interface WizardListener
    Defines the interface a class, which should be notified when the user navigates within a PreferenceActivity, which is used as wizard, by using its next-, back- and finish-button. The return values of the interface's methods allow to take influence on the navigation, e.g. if the currently shown preferences should be validated.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onFinish(int position, PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader, Fragment fragment, Bundle bundle)
      The method, which is invoked, when the user wants to finish the last step of the wizard.
      Bundle onNextStep(int position, PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader, Fragment fragment, Bundle bundle)
      The method, which is invoked, when the user wants to navigate to the next step of the wizard.
      Bundle onPreviousStep(int position, PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader, Fragment fragment, Bundle bundle)
      The method, which is invoked, when the user wants to navigate to the previous step of the wizard.
      boolean onSkip(int position, PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader, Fragment fragment, Bundle bundle)
      The method, which is invoked, when the user wants to skip the wizard.

    • Method Detail

      • onNextStep

        Bundle onNextStep(int position,
                  PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader,
                  Fragment fragment,
                  Bundle bundle)
        The method, which is invoked, when the user wants to navigate to the next step of the wizard.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the currently selected preference header as an Integer value
        preferenceHeader - The currently selected preference header as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader
        fragment - The currently shown fragment as an instance of the class Fragment
        bundle - A bundle, which contains the parameters, which have been passed to the currently shown fragment or null, if no parameters have been passed to the fragment
        Returns:
        The bundle, which should be passed to the next fragment, as an instance of the class Bundle or null, if navigating to the next step of the wizard should not be allowed

      • onPreviousStep

        Bundle onPreviousStep(int position,
                      PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader,
                      Fragment fragment,
                      Bundle bundle)
        The method, which is invoked, when the user wants to navigate to the previous step of the wizard.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the currently selected preference header as an Integer value
        preferenceHeader - The currently selected preference header as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader
        fragment - The currently shown fragment as an instance of the class Fragment
        bundle - A bundle, which contains the parameters, which have been passed to the currently shown fragment or null, if no parameters have been passed to the fragment
        Returns:
        The bundle, which should be passed to the next fragment, as an instance of the class Bundle or null, if navigating to the previous step of the wizard should not be allowed

      • onFinish

        boolean onFinish(int position,
                 PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader,
                 Fragment fragment,
                 Bundle bundle)
        The method, which is invoked, when the user wants to finish the last step of the wizard.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the currently selected preference header as an Integer value
        preferenceHeader - The currently selected preference header as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader
        fragment - The currently shown fragment as an instance of the class Fragment
        bundle - A bundle, which contains the parameters, which have been passed to the currently shown fragment or null, if no parameters have been passed to the fragment
        Returns:
        True, if finishing the wizard should be allowed, false otherwise

      • onSkip

        boolean onSkip(int position,
               PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader,
               Fragment fragment,
               Bundle bundle)
        The method, which is invoked, when the user wants to skip the wizard.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the currently selected preference header as an Integer value
        preferenceHeader - The currently selected preference header as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader
        fragment - The currently shown fragment as an instance of the class Fragment
        bundle - A bundle, which contains the parameters, which have been passed to the currently shown fragment or null, if no parameters have been passed to the fragment
        Returns:
        True, if skipping the wizard should be allowed, false otherwise
